src:
Statistik Mengejutkan Virgil van Dijk yang Jauh Lebih Baik dari Mo Salah
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Virgil van Dijk boleh jadi telah menjadi bentang tangguh pertahanan Liverpool. Namun, bek tengah bertubuh besar ini ternyata punya kemampuan hebat lain yang terabaikan. Van Dijk jago mengumpan bola.
Sejak mendatangkan Van Dijk, Liverpool menjelma jadi salah satu tim terkuat di Inggris. Kehadiran Van Dijk telah menyelesaikan satu masalah utama mereka, pertahanan jadi lebih baik dan bisa bermain lebih tenang.
Biar begitu, Van Dijk ternyata berperan lebih penting dari sekadar menahan bola. Dia punya ketenangan luar biasa saat membawa bola di wilayah bertahan The Reds, yang membuatnya sering mengawali serangan Liverpool.
Sebagai bek tengah, Van Dijk ternyata punya torehan umpan sukses luar biasa. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Virgil van Dijk's Shocking Statistics That Are Much Better Than Mo Salah
05 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Virgil van Dijk may have been a formidable landscape for Liverpool's defense. However, this big central defender turned out to have another great ability that was overlooked. Van Dijk is good at passing the ball.
Since bringing Van Dijk, Liverpool was transformed into one of the strongest teams in England. The presence of Van Dijk has solved one of their main problems, the defense is better and can play more calmly.
Even so, Van Dijk turned out to play a more important role than just holding the ball. He had an extraordinary calm when he brought the ball in the defense area of the Reds, which made him often start Liverpool attacks.
As a central defender, Van Dijk turned out to have a notch of extraordinary success. Read below, Bolaneters!
